content: Hey friends. Saw that starting recently, the cargo plugin tests were failing on nightly rust. Repro with cargo test --test testsuite plugins::plugin_to_the_max. Appears to be from https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/85296 (at a glance at least).

error[E0557]: feature has been removed
 --> /Users/nipunn/src/cargo/target/debug/tmp/cit/t0/bar/src/lib.rs:2:28
  |
2 |                 #![feature(plugin_registrar, rustc_private)]
  |                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ feature has been removed
  |
  = note: a __rustc_plugin_registrar symbol must now be defined instead

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `rustc_driver`
 --> /Users/nipunn/src/cargo/target/debug/tmp/cit/t0/bar/src/lib.rs:5:17
  |
5 |                 extern crate rustc_driver;
  |                 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ can't find crate
Oh sweet. I can give it a review. Should have checked the open PRs.
